transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Sir good evening, main India Mart se baat kar raha tha.
Customer: Kahan se sir?
Executive: India Mart se sir. Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Morning mein aap hi se baat hua tha afternoon mein?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji boliye.
Executive: Wo jo last mein 465 aap hi ka number tha na, kyuki wo lag nahi raha tha to maine ispe lagaya call.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To wo maine na team se baat kiya tha backend pe to ek do keywords ki mapping ka issue tha.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To wo primary mapping nahi thi do category mein, wo matlab India Mart ka internal hota hai. To mere khayal se aap logon ne internally apna wo keywords wagera update kare honge na. To usme primary mapping wagera nahi thi jiski wajah se listing nahi ho rahi thi un keywords ki. To wo primary mapping correct kar di hai maine aur kuch kuch categories mein bataye.
Customer: Sir main jaan sakta hu kis project ke bare mein bol rahe hain?
Executive: Maine isliye pucha tha main actually na India Mart se baat kar raha tha. Morning meri is number pe baat hui thi last mein 465 unka ek complaint aaya tha ki India Mart se leads jyada generate nahi ho rahi hai. To mere khayal se.
Customer: Haan, number se baat hui thi kya?
Executive: Haan, Ankur sir se 989614465.
Executive: Abhi main unka number try kar raha tha to unka number laga nahi to ye aapka ye ke number hai jo India Mart se registered tha. Kyuki unka jo mere paas call aaya tha to wo apne number se aaya tha shayad. 9896 wale se. Abhi main unka call try kar raha tha to unka number laga nahi to fir maine is number pe call kiya. Kyuki meri unse first time baat hui thi to I thought of ki shayad is number pe bhi wo available honge. Fir maine initially aapse pucha ki meri aap hi se baat hui thi 989614465 is number se.
Customer: Haan is number pe meri baat hui thi subah aur afternoon mein.
Executive: Abhi ye number connect nahi ho raha hai to fir maine ye India Mart pe jo aapka ye wala number registered hai uspe call kiya.
Customer: Okay so aapne wo keywords add kar diye sir right?
Executive: Haan maine keywords to already added the basically maine primary mapping update kari hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir main update kar deta hu team ko.
Customer: Wo ek bar aap please team ko update kar dena. Secondly thoda sa important ye hoga abhi is bar kyuki pehle unhone bola tha instagram marketing wale keywords ko hum log hata de to maine wo hata diya hai. Wo time system pe the thik hai. Apart from that jo hamara major 80% of the contributor hai regarding the web development website development service ka to iski is in leads ka filhal pichle kuch time se sold out jo hai wo bahut jyada fast hai. Ye already meri sir se baat hui hai video meeting mein ki wo leads jaldi sold out ho rahi hai to our team has to be on toes ki wo thoda sa aur jyada unhe na frequently refresh karke India Mart check karna padega. This is whole over jo abhi as of now solution samajh mein aaya hai.
Executive: As such koi backend pe technical issue find out hua nahi hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir main update kar deta hu mapping ke liye aur wo leads ke liye bhi main bata deta hu.
Customer: Baki maine sir ko although whatsapp kiya tha kyuki number lag nahi raha tha. To main ek bar unko whatsapp pe hi report de dunga thik hai. Iska na report share kar dena. Haan ek last cheez aur hai sir iska na ek hamare paas na concern raise hua tha to isko na main aise yahan se close karunga to aapke registered mail id mere khayal se Ankur sir ka hi hai na registered mail id?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan to thik hai wo main ek bar fir sir se sir ko main whatsapp kar deta hu to uska ek feedback jata hai mere ko wo chahiye hoga. To wo mere khayal se registered mail id Ankur sir wali hai Ankur wali. Haan thik hai main ek bar fir main unko whatsapp kar deta hu.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Welcome sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's leads were not generating properly.

- Customer had an issue with keyword mapping.

- Wants feedback on registered email ID.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the primary mapping.

- Executive will update the team about the issue.

- Executive will update about leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp the report to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mapping, keywords, whatsapp
